title: Diversity and Inclusive Excellence Fund
description: To provide programmatic, faculty, and/or scholarship support to help with the achievement of a diverse student body and to instill the principles of inclusiveness in the Law School community at the University of Colorado Boulder.
marketingContent: To provide programmatic, faculty, and/or scholarship support to help with the achievement of a diverse student body and to instill the principles of inclusiveness in the Law School community at the University of Colorado Boulder.
